Summary: Similar to the sighting I reported on 4-29-07.
divs: Sighting DetailsToday, Sunday (5-27-07), at about 4:40p.m., I was working as a concierge in a high rise condo on the beach (in Boca Raton)when I noticed a white object over the Atlantic Ocean. The event is very similar to the event I reported on 4-29-07, the only difference being the object was out near the horizon and I was able to get three pictures using my Kodak Z740 Digital Camera. Again, as same as the last time, the object remained stationary for a good hour above the ocean before heavy cloud cover made it impossible to observe. When I magnified the image up to 8x using the cameras built in system, the object appeared to be diamond shaped. As soon as I can transfer the images to my computer, I will upload the pictures.
trends: There have been 24 other sightings in Boca Raton
There were no other sightings in Boca Raton on or around May 27th 2007
